channel.title: Songs you made when you were feeling down
channel.description:
So they don’t have to be sad songs, just something you made when you were feeling down.
I’m interested to see whether they’re happy or moody or if you just keep to a consistent style.
So yeah, throw your links down below. Old stuff, new stuff, it’s all gooood.

item.title: Songs you made when you were feeling down
item.dc:creator: Sunny
item.description:
I put everything here so far into a playlist (save for the auxy link) for everyone’s enjoyment. I think there’s lot of strong pieces in here.

https://soundcloud.com/alwayssunnyinlogan/sets/songs-made-while-feeling-down/s-bhFTs

Read full topic
item.source: Songs you made when you were feeling down

item.title: Songs you made when you were feeling down
item.dc:creator: DontPartyWithGuns
item.description:
For me it’s definitely whoosis.
I didn’t have school because of a severe storm and I was overall not in a good mood.

Also I put a flanger effect on a hi-hat rythym, am I cool yet?

Read full topic

item.title: Songs you made when you were feeling down
item.dc:creator: enby
item.description:
Erm, probably this song for right now. I have something related to this feeling coming out after I figure out how to produce vocals. honestly I’m super emo because most of my music deals with personal stuff life self exploration and self acceptance
